sudoku.title: Sudoku Solver from Image
sudoku.description: A Python project that solves Sudoku puzzles from images. Includes a Flutter mobile app and a Flask API. Uses OpenCV and TensorFlow.
sudoku.note: Note: The project is the first AI project I worked on. It might not be very accurate.

eventManagement.title: Event Management Website
eventManagement.description: A web-based event management system using Google Maps API. Built with HTML/CSS/JavaScript and connected to Firebase. Includes an Android companion app.
eventManagement.note: Note: This project was the first team project I worked on, it was an excellent stepping stone to introduce me to web development.

socialNetwork.title: Social Network Mobile App
socialNetwork.description: A mobile application combining features of LinkedIn and Instagram. Built with React Native, uses REST API, and follows MVC architecture. Includes a web application counterpart.
